title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.4 - Celebration of religious holidays or festivals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.4 - Celebration of religious holidays or festivals

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of section
7024.1
(b) of this

Part, prisoners shall be permitted to celebrate religious holidays or festivals
on an individual or congregate basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7024.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
